Hunde (Kihunde; kwa Luhunde, Kobi, Rukobi) bụ asụsụ Great Lakes Bantu nke ndị Hunde ma ọ bụ Bahunde na-asụ na mpaghara Nord-Kivu na Democratic Republic of the Congo
A na-asụ ya na mpaghara Masisi, Walikale, Nyiragongo, Rutshuru na Kalehe. E nwekwara ụfọdụ ndị na-asụ ya na obodo  Rwanda na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Uganda
Lelee Yahunde, Bahunde, Yahudi, Jacob, Kobi.
